entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. 30 percent chance of flurries over southern sections late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
